actions.desc: The devil makes two scimitar attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is neither undead nor a construct, it also takes 5 (1d10) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw. Plants, oozes, and creatures with the Amphibious, Water Breathing, or Water Form traits have disadvantage on this saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also gains one level of exhaustion.
actions.name: Scimitar

damage_resistances: acid, cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
languages: Celestial, Common, Gnoll, Infernal, telepathy 120 ft.
name: Salt Devil

special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.
special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight

special_abilities.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance

special_abilities.desc:
the devil's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The devil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: darkness

1/day each: harm, teleport
special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting

special_abilities.desc: Summon Devil (1/Day): The salt devil has a 40 percent chance of summoning one salt devil
special_abilities.name: Variant: Devil Summoning
